xmlToMap

public static java.util.Map xmlToMap(java.io.InputStream input, java.lang.String encoding)
Reads an XML stream from input and converts it to a map that can be used to construct a Grails domain objects (passing the map to the domain object constructor).

a map representig the input XML stream.
